name: Road Trip
description:
Road Trip - You have to face a small road adventure. Get behind the wheel of your car, but first you have to see it in order. Head to the ranch, but remember, you need to be there by tomorrow!

Beautiful locations and interesting places are waiting for you in the game! Drive through muddy roads and rivers, and other surveys that will take the next path! Be prepared for dirty, forest and other explorations and report what is found to stand in any diseases.
